DOC.brief_summary: In two session four day nurse expose dynamic lighting normal ( reference ) lighting . Through psychological test T.O.D.A . ( Test divide attention ) T.O.S.S.A . ( Test sustain selective attention ) , focus test . These two test run 5 time . The investigator also ask fill : 3 questionnaire , fatigue mood , sleep Questions Life .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Dynamic Light Application Performance ICU Nurses
